Description: AI-powered personalized playlist recommendations based on listening history
Curated playlists for different moods and activities
Catalog of songs including international and local artists
Algorithm that suggests new songs and artists to users
Native mobile application for iOS and Android
App loading speed and responsiveness during usage
Search functionality for finding songs, artists, and playlists
Share tracks and playlists with friends on social media
Download songs for offline listening during commute
Real-time lyrics display during song playback
Dark mode and other visual customization options
Create and edit playlists together with friends
Help center and support team for billing and technical issues
Subscription tiers and free tier with ads
